column1: AkiQcani Ayatana bIta rAgasya Bava agra tAduccalitasya SAnta vihAra  saMjQA pUrvakeNa manasikAreNa AsTAvarANAm citta cEtta DarmANAm tat ekatsTAvarANAm yaH niroDaH
